main_definition: Sick refers to a state of ill health or feeling unwell.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Feeling physically ill or having an adverse reaction to something, such as food poisoning.
meanings_and_examples.example: After eating the expired seafood, he felt sick and vomited.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Impressive or extraordinary; often used informally in a playful context to show admiration.
meanings_and_examples.example: Her dance moves were so sick!

meanings_and_examples.definition: Unusually good, skillfully done; usually expressed through slang and may not be appropriate for all audiences.
meanings_and_examples.example: The skateboard trick he pulled off was totally sick.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To criticize or disapprove of something harshly.
meanings_and_examples.example: His constant complaints about the office policies made everyone feel sick.
